hypothesis_content.title: BTC Stability to DOGE/SHIB Momentum Transfer
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL or BULL regimes, when BTC trades within a +/- 2% range for 12 consecutive hours, a breakout in the DOGE/BTC or SHIB/BTC pair exceeding a 5% move triggers a momentum spillover into other large-cap memecoins (PEPE, FLOKI, BONK) within the next 4 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: BTC stability reduces systemic risk, allowing capital to rotate into higher-beta narratives. DOGE and SHIB act as sentiment bellwethers for the memecoin sector. Momentum in these leaders often cascades to smaller peers as traders seek the 'next pump'.
entry_conditions: Signal: DOGE/BTC or SHIB/BTC 1-hour price change > |5%|
Entry: Long the lagging memecoin (PEPE, FLOKI, BONK) with the lowest 4-hour RSI (< 55) at the close of the 1-hour signal candle

exit_conditions.take_profit: When the entered memecoin's 4-hour RSI reaches 75

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Less than 40% of signals result in the lagging memecoin achieving a positive return greater than the signal coin's return over the 8-hour window.
